Name: Girl Next Door
About the game: Howdy neighbor! On this street, we swap more than a cup of flour. Girl Next Door is a trip down mammary lane-- featuring FIVE steaming stories that explore the dirty side of domestic life. From late-night naughty babysitters to cleaning the pool for the neighborhood cougar, these stories make your picket-fence fantasies come true. Experience Girl Next Door with or without VR, and look forward to more stories on the way. Believe us, the monthly newsletter for this neighborhood just gets wilder as the summer brings the heat … Five unique stories that can be experienced in any order you like. Pick the theme that’s got you steamy… Play your way: Customize your sex partner combos! Supports No-VR mode with KBM alternative. If VR is your fancy: Supports HTC Vive and Oculus Rift with Touch Regularly updated stories: This is just the beginning of a growing anthology of domestic bliss. Welcome to the neighborhood… we think you’ll fit right in!
